Package CS18000_Project04_Summer2019

Class VideoFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • CS18000_Project04_Summer2019.CommonFile
      • CS18000_Project04_Summer2019.VideoFile
  • public class VideoFile
extends CommonFile
    Project 04 - File Manipulator

    This is the VideoFile class. It defines what a video is. It extends the CommonFile class. It gains one additional property, called videoLengthInSeconds, that differentiates it from other CommonFile subclasses.

    Version:
    1.0 (5/26/2019)
    Author:
    Kedar Abhyankar

    • Constructor Detail

      • VideoFile

        public VideoFile​(java.io.File video,
                 long videoLength)
          throws InvalidVideoFileException
        This is the VideoFile Constructor. It should instantiate both the super class's (CommonFile) variables, as well as its own, using the accessor methods in CommonFile. The constructor should only construct the object if the parameter of type long is greater than 0. Otherwise, it should throw an InvalidVideoFileException.
        Parameters:
        video - a File object that is passed in containing the Video which the user wants to examine properties of.
        videoLength - a user inputted length of the video, so that the user can see how "long" the video is.
        Throws:
        InvalidVideoFileException - thrown when the parameter of type long is less than or equal to 0.
